about_the_game:
Welcome to the exclusive preview of PartySaur: Dino Mayhem!


Gather your friends for a unique local multiplayer experience or go online via Steam Remote Play to play our exciting demo including Treasure Bridge mode. Will you have enough skill and dexterity to take on a variety of mini-games and be the best among your friends as you build the bridge to victory?

Get ready for prehistoric fun!

name: PartySaur: Dino Mayhem Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 3200G or similar
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
